title: Akzidenz-Grotesk Collection
content:
I’m buying Akzidenz-Grotesk Collection for my client who is a medical science company; I was wondering if someone knows if the new OT-Pro version contains Greek mathematical glyphs like delta, pi or mu?

Thank you  
KTKM
author: Kristian M

comments.content: These are part of the basic character set, so even the standard [Akzidenz-Grotesk BQ](http://web.archive.org/web/20110407094851/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/akzidenz-grotesk-bq/regular/charmap.html?refby=typographica) has those characters. What the Pro version adds is Eastern European, Turkish, and Baltic character sets, as well as small caps and figure alts (oldstyle/lining, fractions) rolled into one font per style.
The new one sounds like a worthy purchase. Must keep this is mind.

Yes, I’m gonna do it!  
Thank you.

KTKM
